Review Title: Do not buy any Sony products through Amazon!
Review Description: Worked for a few months beforethe hard drive died for no apparent reason. The power supply works only to display a hard drive failure message. Do not buy a Sony products through amazon!

Review Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 28, 2018
Review Description: I really love my new PS4 Slim, it's great, easy to setup and has a tons more options.Pros:Current Gen Console as of 2/28/2018Alot faster than the PS3 in generalTons of free gamesPlaystation Now is a pretty decent deal and has a wide selectionTons of media apps like netflix, hulu, amazon video, funimation, etc...Controller allows you to change brightness of glowTons of customization options to suit your console to you (including high contrast)Playstation plus seems to offer better deals for digital.Cons:No more composite output, which means I can't get audio through my pc the easy wayWhen you are downloading many items there can be menu lagSome apps tend to glitch and close application isn't an option. However, you can easily just restart.I got this because I had no reason to get the PS4 Pro, I don't have a 4K TV nor do I really care about 4K Gaming (and the 6-8 games that are supported for 4K on the Pro.) Honestly I just found this to be a better deal, as the Pro just seems to be a lazy cashgrab. It definitely is slim and fits into pretty much any keyboard space (for those of you with multiple desks like me.)Pretty much the ideal console in my opinion.

Review Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2017
Review Description: If you do not have a 4K TV, then you do not need PS4 pro.Slim is just fine.

Review Date: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2017
Review Title: So much faster than Original Playstation 4
Review Description: I‚Äôve had the original PS4 system since it came and and have long run out of space on the 500GB hard drive so I decided to buy a newer updated version of the PS4.. the ps4 slim is awesome. There is a very noticeable performance between my slim and the original. The network connection on my slim is twice as good, games load much faster, download times are much quicker and most importantly I have twice as much HD space for games. I don‚Äôt even play a lot of games but still somehow ran out. If you‚Äôre noticing a decline in performance on your original ps4 you should definitely invest in a new with plus you can add on a 4 year warranty.

Review Date: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2018
Review Description: So. This was an easy process. Up until the software update. NOTHING TO DO WITH THE SELLER. In short please place a few hours aside for the software update.  Each game you buy will have game updates. Each app you install (Amazon Netflix etc);will need to update . Very easy to use but put some time aside (if u have kids dont tell them you have it until updates are installed.Clean packed great all items included. No issues and, so far (less than 24 hrs), works fine

Review Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2017
Review Title: AMAZON provided an excellent Product, Excellent protection to ship
Review Description: AMAZON provided an excellent Product, Excellent protection to ship, and Excellent Product PS 4 - I have had all the previous Playstation Game machines, and do warn PS 4 buyers that SONY has never implemented ability to play U R PS 2 or PS 3 games on its PS4 system.PS 4 literature in box says they have BACKWARD COMPATIBILITY - but that is a "LIE".XBOX ONE does have BACKWARD COMPATIBILITY on previous games. NOT SONY w/ its PS4.The PS4 is an excellent product w/ 1 T'bite Storage and also uses less electricity than the 500GB storage models.AMAZON packaging was great when received. no complaints there. No complaints of the PS 4 either at this stage.So far I love it!But hate the NO PS 4 backward Compatibility, even with PLAYSTATION PLUS which is required to play & view ONLINE INTERNET.So Buyers who want to get in on PS 4 ground floor BUY only games that have ability to PLAY standalone, to get started.

Review Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2018
Review Description: Very disappointed, I received the 500gb PS4 instead of the 1tb I purchased.Also, serial number is a bit shady, it starts with MG instead of the normal MC or MB.It says ‚ÄúAmazon‚Äôs Choice‚Äù on the item so I bought it with confidence...Will return and will never buy consoles on Amazon again.

Review Date: Reviewed in the United States on February 22, 2019
Review Description: Seriously DO NOT BUY THIS. I was looking forward to this all week, even got a game and headset for it. I come home, hook it up, and it works just fine. I'm going through setting up my account and as I'm putting in my card info for PlayStation plus, it shuts off out of no where. I try to plug it into a different outlet, still doesn't work. I press the power button, nothing. When it does come on, it's on for no longer than a few minutes. I can hear a slight staticy sound when I move the power cord around. Sometimes it'll even shut off with a static screen on the TV as it shuts off. This isn't just a simple overheating problem, this is a defective console. I'm assuming the seller receives faulty consoles that other unhappy consumers have returned and just resells them for cheap instead of actually fixing them. RIDICULOUS. Now I have to wait over a week to get my money back and I MIGHT try to get a different console, but you can bet I'm staying FARRRR away from Amazon. Thanks for wasting my time.

Review Title: Unwilling to work with the customer
Review Description: They sold me a PlayStation with a faulty disk drive they wanted me to go through the hassle of returning the console after I already had games downloaded and my account setup and wouldn‚Äôt give me some kind of refund

Review Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2019
Review Description: I like the  PS and have always been a fan; the games are great, but that is a matter of opinion, so I'm giving the system 2 stars based on the system itself and my experience. I guess it goes without saying it hasn't been great. I had to replace my first PS because the infamous disc-eject issue. I tried everything but it just kept happening. My second PS is this slim edition. So far so good (hasn't broken), but compared to any system I've ever had (maybe beside the NES) it freezes the most, sometimes it just goes extremely slow in menus to the point you almost have to walk away before it's operational. It's also froze a few times without the power button being able to shut it off so you have to unplug, I assume, which has caused corrupted data, which has caused me to have to a reset. Literally the only other person I know with a PS, whom is a close Cousin of mine, has had to replace 2 systems already. We've ranted about how awful our experience has been with the PS4 on more than one occasion being that we've bought 5 systems between two people...for two people. I'm not saying anybody shouldn't buy one, more than likely yours will work, I'm sure, but I still feel the need to put in my 2 cents.

Review Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2018
Review Description: The ps4 was defective. Everything seemed to work properly but when I downloaded a game, I could not open it. Every time I tried I just got an error code.

Review Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2018
Review Description: I wanted to discover what all the excitement about gaming and game consoles was about. Honestly, if you'e never done this sort of thing before, skip it. Reading a book, or going for a walk beat this type of entertainment easily. I can see how a child might be captivated by it; but not a fully functional adult.I spent about $200 on a variety of different types of games to see which one was right for me. Just figuring out how the controller works in most games is a deterrent. In any event, once you get the hang of that, "gaming" is a bit time consuming. At best, your mind becomes immersed in the game environment, and before long, you notice a few hours have passed. The entertainment value you gain for the hours of investment is mediocre at best. Go to a movie, it's cheaper and sticks with you longer.Now that I've got this thing, I'll continue to use it and explore more games. If I had it to do over again, I'd stay at a nice hotel for a weekend for the same money I spent on this device and be a bit happier for it.

Review Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 10, 2018
Review Title: Not Recommended For Youtubers and Hardcore Gamers!
Review Description: While the system was working it was awesome, but the main issues I had on the system was every time the console updated, It had issues with coming back on. i am not sure if it was the software issue or my settings on my PS4, plus my console was getting really hot after about 5hrs of play, and I am a youtuber and gamer, so I play a lot throughout my work week and when I am off.So if you are like me as a gamer that requires continuous play of lets plays on LiveStream,I strongly recommend you pay the extra green and get the Pro Version.This model is fine for a casual gamer, but this machine tends to have many bugs and issues.I had to send mine in to playstation twice for them to get my console back on.Not very reliable for a hardcore gamer.

Review Date: Reviewed in the United States on July 28, 2017
Review Description: I haven't stopped using this since I bought it! I have so much fun playing my games on here, streaming movies/videos and my personal favorite: listening to Spotify! It's amazing and has a nice, modern, sleek interface. If you're already familiar with Playstation, then it isn't as hard to use (so many button have so many uses), but if you aren't a faithful Playstation user, you may have a little difficulty remembering which button does what. Since I am a faithful PS user, I'm gonna go ahead and give it 5 stars because the buttons weren't an issue for me. 10/10 would recommend.

Review Date: Reviewed in the United States on August 8, 2018
Review Title: Awesome Console but controller keeps disconnecting
Review Description: So after waiting a little while I finally got my PS4 console. It's an amazing device and I really love it but one concern is that for some strange reason my controller disconnects every 5 minutes while maneuvering through my games library or even while gaming. This is really annoying and costs me dearly as it disconnects while playing, forcing me to push the little button behind to reset it every time. I know its the controller because even when I go to settings and change the connection from Bluetooth to USB cable it does the same thing. Shame my return window is closed, I'll just have to buy another controller, could have used that money to pre-order Spiderman but such is life I guess. Other than my control glitch its a good buy and a good console.

Review Date: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2019
Review Title: Wrong model received initially, but customer service was fantastic.
Review Description: I was sent the wrong model; I received a 500GB instead of a 1TB like advertised. The PS4 works fine, came with everything. However, it was the wrong model. I contacted the seller and they were verylond and understanding on the mistake. I sent pictures for proof. I didn't want to return it because it was fine, worked, and I bought it to play a game on its release date the next day after it arrived. They were really sweet about listening to my concern about storage space and my disappointment on how I installed all my games and the storage was almost out (and it was literally 4 games) and that's why I bought a 1TB instead of a 500gb like I received - the storage space, as that was my only real concern. After speaking about how to resolve it, me mentioning I could get an external drive, I just didn't have the money at the moment because I spent all my funds on what I assumed would be a 1TB model and the new game I bought it for - they gave me a discount refund for 50$, so I could purchase an external hard drive for storage to make up for me not having a 1TB model. Customer service was great, I didn't have a problem other than being sent the wrong model for storage, which they helped me resolve with partial, small refund.  I was disappointed because of the storage issue, but with their help and understanding and customer support, I'm able to say I'm very content and happy with my purchase. :) If you ever get a wrong model or something is broken when you buy something, always contact your seller - theyight be able to help! Especially if it's not anything you did.

Review Date: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2017
Review Title: now I can enjoy many outstanding playstation exclusive games such as the uncharted ...
Review Description: got this on the blackfriday dealcame on time, works well, everything's in order. now I can enjoy many outstanding playstation exclusive games such as the uncharted series and horizon zero dawn

Review Date: Reviewed in the United States on April 16, 2019
Review Title: Do not purchase if you have a Denon receiver!!!!
Review Description: Within weeks of purchasing this item, I began having problems with the HDMI pass through with my Denon receiver. It worked well for a few days, then I began getting errors from the receiver. I tried different HDMI slots and got the same error messages. When I contacted Sony concerning this issue, they advised that this was not there problem. When I contacted Denon technical support, they indicated that this was a well known problem, specifically with PS4 consoles. Steer clear if you have any make of Denon receiver.
